name: HUNT FOR THE POWER CRYSTALS
description:
THE HUNT FOR THE POWER CRYSTALS IS A PLATFORMER-SHOOTER THAT YOU CAN PLAY ALONE OR WITH FRIENDS. THE MISSION IS SIMPLE - COLLECT COINS TO UNLOCK NEW STAGES, AND SHOOT DOWN THE MONSTERS. USE THE DIFFERENT POWER CRYSTALS TO SHOOT ENERGY FROM YOUR HANDS.

THE GAME STARING MEW THE SUPER FOX. HIS WIFE, POLICE OFFICER MOCHA. SILVER THE BUNNY, A MEMBER OF THE BUNNY-COMMANDO SPECIAL FORCE. A GOOD FRIEND OF DANNY SANDY AND ZAK. AND ASH THE CAT, HE JUST DECIDED TO JOIN BECAUSE FOUR CHARACTERS WERE NEEDED.
